title: How to solve the crashing issue in Pixel 4XL?
content:
My Pixel 4 Xl is just 6 months old with Android 11. 

All the apps are getting crashed very frequently including the social media apps. I googled for the issue followed the so-called solutions. I updated all the apps. I cleared all the cache files. I still have 52% memory left on my phone. Nevertheless, I see my phone crashing all the apps, saying "System UI not responding", and then either restarting or refreshing itself. This has been getting very annoying for the last 4-5 days. 

Why would this happen continuously?
